project_abstract.cdata: The Sichuan Power Transmission Project will: (a) alleviate an acute shortage of electricity by the construction of a 500-kV transmission network for connecting the ongoing Ertan hydroelectric project to the Sichuan power grid, as well as reinforcing the existing power transmission system; (b) assist in designing and implementing a time-bound program to implement power subsector reforms in Sichuan Province; (c) support the implementation of further power tariff rationalization; (d) promote transfer of contemporary technologies for extra-high voltage transmission networks; (e) strengthen institutional capabilities for environmental management and operation capabilities through well-focused staff training programs. The project will include: (a) construction of an new 500-kV transmission network; (b) carrying out of environmental management and resettlement programs; (c) extension of technical assistance for implementation of the State Planning Commission's reform plan, organization improvements, and development of accounting and financial management systems; and (d) provision of engineering and construction management services and training.

P036947.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>四川输变电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将：（1）建设500千伏输电网，将在建二滩水电项目接入四川电网，加固现有输电系统，从而缓解四川省电力紧缺状况；（2）协助设计并实施一项有时限的四川省电力行业改革实施方案；（3）支持实施电价进一步合理化方案；（4）促进现代超高压输电网技术转让；（5）通过针对性强的人员培训增强环境管理机构能力和运营能力。项目内容包括：（1）新建500千伏输电网；（2）实施环境管理和移民工程；（3）为实施国家发改委制定的改革方案、机构改革以及建立会计和财务管理系统提供技术援助；（4）提供工程和施工管理服务与培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
